class_e_02_battle_01:
Another day, another round of battle study! Osu!
Let’s get right to it![VAR 0114(0024)]
class_e_02_battle_02: Is everyone excited about the Treasure Hunt?![VAR 0114(0024)]
class_e_02_battle_03:
It’s always a great adventure! You get to take on
Gyms, go to new places, and run all over the\r
place with your partner Pokémon![VAR 0114(0024)]
class_e_02_battle_04:
And, while you’re running around out there,
I’ll bet you’ll come across some big, shining\r
[VAR COLOR(0006)]crystals [VAR COLOR(0000)]fairly often as well.[VAR 0114(0024)]
class_e_02_battle_05:
These crystals are actually collections of Terastal
energy that’s seeped up out of the ground![VAR 0114(0024)]
class_e_02_battle_06:
You can check out these crystals to battle Tera
Pokémon with your friends or other Trainers in a\r
group of four.[VAR 0114(0024)]
class_e_02_battle_07: We call those battles...Tera Raid Battles![VAR 0114(0024)]
class_e_02_battle_08:
The Tera Pokémon you’ll face off against in Tera
Raid Battles are crazy tough![VAR 0114(0024)]
class_e_02_battle_09:
They sometimes act differently than regular
Pokémon, so you’ll need to be on your guard![VAR 0114(0024)]
class_e_02_battle_10:
Luckily, Trainers can also use a special action in
Tera Raid Battles. It’s called [VAR COLOR(0006)]cheering[VAR COLOR(0000)]![VAR 0114(0024)]
class_e_02_battle_11: And there are three different cheers you can use![VAR 0114(0024)]
class_e_02_battle_12:
The first cheer is “[VAR COLOR(0006)]Go all out![VAR COLOR(0000)]” It boosts the
Attack and Sp. Atk of all ally Pokémon.[VAR 0114(0024)]
class_e_02_battle_13:
The second is “[VAR COLOR(0006)]Hang tough![VAR COLOR(0000)]” This one boosts
the Defense and Sp. Def of all ally Pokémon.[VAR 0114(0024)]
class_e_02_battle_14: And the third— Well, let’s see if you can guess![VAR 0114(0024)]
class_e_02_battle_15:
This cheer restores HP for all ally Pokémon.
What do you think it is?[VAR 0114(0024)]
class_e_02_battle_answer_01:
That’s right! Maybe I should make YOU the battle
teacher, huh, new kid?![VAR 0114(0024)]
class_e_02_battle_answer_02:
Wham-Bam Potion?! That sounds less like a cheer
and more like a seriously heavy-handed medical\r
treatment or something![VAR 0114(0024)]
class_e_02_battle_answer_03:
Explosive healing wave?! That’s a wild answer if
I ever heard one! But I think I’d like to give that\r
move a whirl if it really existed![VAR 0114(0024)]
class_e_02_battle_16:
The third and final cheer is “[VAR COLOR(0006)]Heal up![VAR COLOR(0000)]” It’s a real
powerhouse, with the ability to both restore HP\r
and cure status conditions![VAR 0114(0024)]
class_e_02_battle_17:
You can cheer up to three times during a single
Tera Raid Battle.[VAR 0114(0024)]
class_e_02_battle_18:
Also, cheering uses up a turn in battle, so you
won’t be able to have your Pokémon use any of\r
their moves when you cheer![VAR 0114(0024)]
class_e_02_battle_20:
Try everything at your disposal! If nothing seems
to be working, try cheering on your allies![VAR 0114(0024)]
class_e_02_battle_21:
Providing support for your team can sometimes
open up a new realm of possibilities![VAR 0114(0024)]
class_e_02_battle_22:
Aw, man! I was just about to suggest we do some
hands-on practice to really drive the point home,\r
but I guess we’re out of time...[VAR 0114(0024)]
class_e_02_battle_23: Class is over for now! Take care, you little rascals![VAR 0114(0024)]
